SELECT [s].[Year], [s].[Month], COALESCE(SUM([s].[Cost]), 0.0) AS [TotalSales]
FROM (
    SELECT [b].[Cost], DATEPART(year, [b].[CreatedAt]) AS [Year], DATEPART(month, [b].[CreatedAt]) AS [Month]
    FROM [BaseOrders] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[CreatedAt] >= @__from_0 AND [b].[CreatedAt] <= @__to_1
) AS [s]
GROUP BY [s].[Year], [s].[Month]
ORDER BY COALESCE(SUM([s].[Cost]), 0.0) DESC

FROM [Products] AS [p]

See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2101038 for more information.

SELECT [s].[UserId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Email], [s].[FailedLoginAttempts], [s].[FullName], [s].[HashedPassword], [s].[IsDeleted], [s].[IsEmailConfirmed], [s].[IsLocked], [s].[IsTwoFactorEnabled], [s].[Language], [s].[LastLogIn], [s].[LastPasswordChange], [s].[LockedUntil], [s].[PhoneNumber], [s].[ProfilePictureUrl], [s].[RoleId], [s].[UpdatedAt], [s].[UserName], [s].[BaseSalary], [s].[FaceFeatureVector], [s].[HireDate], [s0].[EmployeeDepartmentId], [s0].[AppointmentDecisionUrl], [s0].[DepartmentId], [s0].[EmployeeId], [s0].[EndDate], [s0].[IsActive], [s0].[IsManager], [s0].[StartDate], [s0].[DepartmentId0], [s0].[CreatedAt], [s0].[DepartmentDescription], [s0].[DepartmentName], [s0].[IsActive0], [s0].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT [u].[UserId], [u].[CreatedAt], [u].[Email], [u].[FailedLoginAttempts], [u].[FullName], [u].[HashedPassword], [u].[IsDeleted], [u].[IsEmailConfirmed], [u].[IsLocked], [u].[IsTwoFactorEnabled], [u].[Language], [u].[LastLogIn], [u].[LastPasswordChange], [u].[LockedUntil], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[ProfilePictureUrl], [u].[RoleId], [u].[UpdatedAt], [u].[UserName], [e].[BaseSalary], [e].[FaceFeatureVector], [e].[HireDate]
    FROM [Users] AS [u]
    INNER JOIN [Employees] AS [e] ON [u].[UserId] = [e].[UserId]
    WHERE LOWER([u].[FullName]) LIKE @__ToLower_0_contains ESCAPE N'\'
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_1 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_2 ROWS ONLY
) AS [s]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e0].[EmployeeDepartmentId], [e0].[AppointmentDecisionUrl], [e0].[DepartmentId], [e0].[EmployeeId], [e0].[EndDate], [e0].[IsActive], [e0].[IsManager], [e0].[StartDate], [d].[DepartmentId] AS [DepartmentId0], [d].[CreatedAt], [d].[DepartmentDescription], [d].[DepartmentName], [d].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [d].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [EmployeesDepartments] AS [e0]
    INNER JOIN [Departments] AS [d] ON [e0].[DepartmentId] = [d].[DepartmentId]
) AS [s0] ON [s].[UserId] = [s0].[EmployeeId]
ORDER BY [s].[UserId], [s0].[EmployeeDepartmentId]

2025-07-23 19:46:32.926 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (1,819ms) [Parameters=[@___id_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [s1].[FullName], [s1].[PhoneNumber], [s1].[HireDate], [s1].[Email], [s1].[UserId], [a0].[Date], [a0].[TimeIn], [a0].[TimeOut], [a0].[AttendanceId], [i0].[Amount], [i0].[Reason], [i0].[DecisionDate], [i0].[IsPaid], [i0].[IncentiveId], [p0].[Amount], [p0].[Reason], [p0].[DecisionDate], [p0].[IsApplied], [p0].[PenaltyId], [s2].[LeaveId], [s2].[EmployeeId], [s2].[StartDate], [s2].[EndDate], [s2].[LeaveType], [s2].[LeaveStatus], [s2].[IsPaid], [s2].[EmployeeName], [s2].[UserId], [s3].[BaseSalary], [s3].[TotalIncentives], [s3].[TotalPenalties], [s3].[Month], [s3].[Year], [s3].[SalaryId], [s1].[c], [s4].[IsManager], [s4].[JoinDate], [s4].[LeaveDate], [s4].[DepartmentName], [s4].[IsCurrent], [s4].[EmployeeDepartmentId], [s4].[DepartmentId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [u].[FullName], [u].[PhoneNumber], [e].[HireDate], [u].[Email], [u].[UserId], COALESCE((
        SELECT TOP(1) [d].[DepartmentName]
        FROM [EmployeesDepartments] AS [e1]
        INNER JOIN [Departments] AS [d] ON [e1].[DepartmentId] = [d].[DepartmentId]
        WHERE [u].[UserId] = [e1].[EmployeeId] AND [e1].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)), N'N/A') AS [c]
    FROM [Users] AS [u]
    INNER JOIN [Employees] AS [e] ON [u].[UserId] = [e].[UserId]
    WHERE [u].[UserId] = @___id_0
) AS [s1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Date], [a].[TimeIn], [a].[TimeOut], [a].[AttendanceId], [a].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND DATEPART(month, [a].[Date]) = DATEPART(month, GETDATE())
) AS [a0] ON [s1].[UserId] = [a0].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [i].[Amount], [i].[Reason], [i].[DecisionDate], [i].[IsPaid], [i].[IncentiveId], [i].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Incentives] AS [i]
    WHERE [i].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [i0] ON [s1].[UserId] = [i0].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p].[Amount], [p].[Reason], [p].[DecisionDate], [p].[IsApplied], [p].[PenaltyId], [p].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Penalties] AS [p]
    WHERE [p].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [p0] ON [s1].[UserId] = [p0].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [l].[LeaveId], [l].[EmployeeId], [l].[StartDate], [l].[EndDate], [l].[LeaveType], [l].[LeaveStatus], [l].[IsPaid], [s].[FullName] AS [EmployeeName], [s].[UserId]
    FROM [Leaves] AS [l]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[FullName]
        FROM [Users] AS [u0]
        INNER JOIN [Employees] AS [e0] ON [u0].[UserId] = [e0].[UserId]
    ) AS [s] ON [l].[EmployeeId] = [s].[UserId]
    WHERE [l].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [s2] ON [s1].[UserId] = [s2].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [s0].[BaseSalary], [s0].[TotalIncentives], [s0].[TotalPenalties], [s0].[Month], [s0].[Year], [s0].[SalaryId], [s0].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Salaries] AS [s0]
    WHERE [s0].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [s3] ON [s1].[UserId] = [s3].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e2].[IsManager], [e2].[StartDate] AS [JoinDate], [e2].[EndDate] AS [LeaveDate], [d0].[DepartmentName], [e2].[IsActive] AS [IsCurrent], [e2].[EmployeeDepartmentId], [d0].[DepartmentId], [e2].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [EmployeesDepartments] AS [e2]
    INNER JOIN [Departments] AS [d0] ON [e2].[DepartmentId] = [d0].[DepartmentId]
) AS [s4] ON [s1].[UserId] = [s4].[EmployeeId]
ORDER BY [s1].[UserId], [a0].[AttendanceId], [i0].[IncentiveId], [p0].[PenaltyId], [s2].[LeaveId], [s2].[UserId], [s3].[SalaryId], [s4].[JoinDate] DESC, [s4].[EmployeeDepartmentId]

SELECT [s1].[FullName], [s1].[PhoneNumber], [s1].[HireDate], [s1].[Email], [s1].[UserId], [a0].[Date], [a0].[TimeIn], [a0].[TimeOut], [a0].[AttendanceId], [i0].[Amount], [i0].[Reason], [i0].[DecisionDate], [i0].[IsPaid], [i0].[IncentiveId], [p0].[Amount], [p0].[Reason], [p0].[DecisionDate], [p0].[IsApplied], [p0].[PenaltyId], [s2].[LeaveId], [s2].[EmployeeId], [s2].[StartDate], [s2].[EndDate], [s2].[LeaveType], [s2].[LeaveStatus], [s2].[IsPaid], [s2].[EmployeeName], [s2].[UserId], [s3].[BaseSalary], [s3].[TotalIncentives], [s3].[TotalPenalties], [s3].[Month], [s3].[Year], [s3].[SalaryId], [s1].[c], [s4].[IsManager], [s4].[JoinDate], [s4].[LeaveDate], [s4].[DepartmentName], [s4].[IsCurrent], [s4].[EmployeeDepartmentId], [s4].[DepartmentId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [u].[FullName], [u].[PhoneNumber], [e].[HireDate], [u].[Email], [u].[UserId], COALESCE((
        SELECT TOP(1) [d].[DepartmentName]
        FROM [EmployeesDepartments] AS [e1]
        INNER JOIN [Departments] AS [d] ON [e1].[DepartmentId] = [d].[DepartmentId]
        WHERE [u].[UserId] = [e1].[EmployeeId] AND [e1].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)), N'N/A') AS [c]
    FROM [Users] AS [u]
    INNER JOIN [Employees] AS [e] ON [u].[UserId] = [e].[UserId]
    WHERE [u].[UserId] = @___id_0
) AS [s1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Date], [a].[TimeIn], [a].[TimeOut], [a].[AttendanceId], [a].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND DATEPART(month, [a].[Date]) = DATEPART(month, GETDATE())
) AS [a0] ON [s1].[UserId] = [a0].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [i].[Amount], [i].[Reason], [i].[DecisionDate], [i].[IsPaid], [i].[IncentiveId], [i].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Incentives] AS [i]
    WHERE [i].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [i0] ON [s1].[UserId] = [i0].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p].[Amount], [p].[Reason], [p].[DecisionDate], [p].[IsApplied], [p].[PenaltyId], [p].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Penalties] AS [p]
    WHERE [p].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [p0] ON [s1].[UserId] = [p0].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [l].[LeaveId], [l].[EmployeeId], [l].[StartDate], [l].[EndDate], [l].[LeaveType], [l].[LeaveStatus], [l].[IsPaid], [s].[FullName] AS [EmployeeName], [s].[UserId]
    FROM [Leaves] AS [l]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[FullName]
        FROM [Users] AS [u0]
        INNER JOIN [Employees] AS [e0] ON [u0].[UserId] = [e0].[UserId]
    ) AS [s] ON [l].[EmployeeId] = [s].[UserId]
    WHERE [l].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [s2] ON [s1].[UserId] = [s2].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [s0].[BaseSalary], [s0].[TotalIncentives], [s0].[TotalPenalties], [s0].[Month], [s0].[Year], [s0].[SalaryId], [s0].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [Salaries] AS [s0]
    WHERE [s0].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [s3] ON [s1].[UserId] = [s3].[EmployeeId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [e2].[IsManager], [e2].[StartDate] AS [JoinDate], [e2].[EndDate] AS [LeaveDate], [d0].[DepartmentName], [e2].[IsActive] AS [IsCurrent], [e2].[EmployeeDepartmentId], [d0].[DepartmentId], [e2].[EmployeeId]
    FROM [EmployeesDepartments] AS [e2]
    INNER JOIN [Departments] AS [d0] ON [e2].[DepartmentId] = [d0].[DepartmentId]
) AS [s4] ON [s1].[UserId] = [s4].[EmployeeId]
ORDER BY [s1].[UserId], [a0].[Date], [a0].[AttendanceId], [i0].[IncentiveId], [p0].[PenaltyId], [s2].[LeaveId], [s2].[UserId], [s3].[SalaryId], [s4].[JoinDate] DESC, [s4].[EmployeeDepartmentId]
